controls.title: Access Control
controls.description: Rules to control physical and logical access to information and other associated assets shall be established and implemented based on business and information security requirements.

policy_mappings.rationale: Blocking arbitrary execution restricts agent capabilities to permitted operations
Approval gates ensure human oversight of sensitive agent actions

evidence_queries.description: Guard decision logs showing blocked and approved operations

gap_recommendations: Implement policies restricting agent tool access by role/scope
Block arbitrary code execution and shell commands
Use approval gates for sensitive operations

controls.title: Authentication Information
controls.description: Allocation and management of authentication information shall be controlled by a management process.

policy_mappings.rationale: Approval workflows demonstrate controlled access to agent capabilities

evidence_queries.description: API key rotation records and agent credential management logs

gap_recommendations: Rotate agent API keys on a defined schedule
Use DashClaw team management for credential control
Document agent credential issuance and revocation procedures

controls.title: Information Access Restriction
controls.description: Access to information and other associated assets shall be restricted in accordance with the established topic-specific policy on access control.

policy_mappings.rationale: Blocking data export prevents unauthorized access to sensitive information
Approval gates on data access ensure only authorized exports

gap_recommendations: Add policies requiring approval for data exports
Block direct PII queries without human oversight
Enable DashClaw DLP scanning for sensitive data patterns

controls.title: Configuration Management
controls.description: Configurations, including security configurations, of hardware, software, services, and networks shall be established, documented, implemented, monitored, and reviewed.

policy_mappings.rationale: Approval gates on infrastructure changes prevent unauthorized configuration modifications
Blocking file mutations prevents unauthorized configuration file changes

gap_recommendations: Gate all infrastructure and deployment actions behind approval
Block or audit all configuration file modifications
Maintain policy version history for change tracking

controls.title: Data Leakage Prevention
controls.description: Data leakage prevention measures shall be applied to systems, networks, and any other devices that process, store, or transmit sensitive information.

policy_mappings.rationale: Blocking data export and file movement prevents data exfiltration
Approval on outbound communications prevents data leakage via messaging

evidence_queries.description: Blocked data export attempts and DLP scan results

gap_recommendations: Block or gate all data export operations
Gate all outbound communications behind approval
Enable DashClaw DLP scanning for PII/secrets in agent outputs

controls.title: Logging
controls.description: Logs that record activities, exceptions, faults, and other relevant events shall be produced, stored, protected, and analyzed.

policy_mappings.rationale: Active guard policies with decision logging provide audit trails of agent operations

evidence_queries.description: Guard decision log count and retention period

gap_recommendations: Ensure all guard decisions are logged (DashClaw provides this)
Configure log retention per compliance requirements
Enable webhook alerts for security-critical events
Review guard decision logs at least monthly

controls.title: Monitoring Activities
controls.description: Networks, systems, and applications shall be monitored for anomalous behavior and appropriate actions taken.

policy_mappings.rationale: Rate limiting detects and prevents anomalous spikes in agent activity

evidence_queries.description: Rate limit enforcement counts and anomaly detection signals

gap_recommendations: Add rate limiting policies to detect anomalous behavior
Enable DashClaw signal detection for autonomy spikes and failures
Configure automated alerts for unusual agent patterns
Consider behavioral_anomaly policy type for pattern detection

controls.title: Information Security for Use of Cloud Services
controls.description: Processes for acquisition, use, management, and exit from cloud services shall be established.

policy_mappings.rationale: Approval gates on deployments ensure controlled use of cloud services

gap_recommendations: Gate all cloud deployment operations behind approval
Document agent cloud service dependencies
Implement exit procedures for agent-managed cloud resources

controls.title: Secure Development Life Cycle
controls.description: Rules for the secure development of software and systems shall be established and applied.

policy_mappings.rationale: Policy dry-run mode enables safe testing of policy changes before enforcement

evidence_queries.description: Policy test and dry-run evaluation logs

gap_recommendations: Run guardrailgen CI tests on all policy changes
Use policy dry-run mode to test impact before enforcement
Maintain guardrails.yml under version control with PR reviews

controls.title: ICT Readiness for Business Continuity
controls.description: ICT readiness shall be planned, implemented, maintained, and tested based on business continuity objectives.

policy_mappings.rationale: Blocking destructive database operations protects data availability

gap_recommendations: Block all destructive database operations
Implement agent fallback procedures
Document agent recovery processes for service continuity
